(:action clean ; Clean an item and update its status
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?cleaner - object ?tool - object)
  :precondition (and 
    (at ?actor ?item) 
    (inventory ?actor ?cleaner) 
    (or (and (cloth ?item) (at ?item storage) (at ?tool storage))
        (and (window ?item) (or (clean ?tool) (scraped ?item)) (or (and (chemical_solvent ?cleaner) (at ?paint_splatters ?item))
                                                                    (glass_cleaner ?cleaner)))
        (and (paint_splatters ?item) (at ?item ?window)))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (or (and (cloth ?item) (not (dirty ?item))

(:action wet ; Wet a resource and update its state
  :parameters (?agent - entity ?resource - entity ?liquid - entity)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?resource) (has_liquid ?liquid))
  :effect (and (wet ?resource) (not (dry ?resource))

(:action position ; Position an item and update the state of the target
  :parameters (?p - player ?r - object ?w - target)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?w) (inventory ?p ?r))
  :effect (and (positioned ?r ?w) (scraped ?w) (not (painted ?w))
